name: BTS City game
description:
A collect of best fun and addict casual games, hosted by cute chibi animals.

Features 4 special games in the first version (more would be added)
*** Get down for real: Tap left / right to rotate bones to get the dog down
*** Hot n Cold: Help the cat to get a hot dog or an ice cream
*** Father and Son: The gecko father carry his son
*** Couple Pig: Their move would make a lovely dance
